As the game progresses, pairs of players trade balls. First, Alice and Bob swap balls. Then, Bob and Claire swap balls. Finally, Alice and Bob swap balls. At the end of the game, Alice has the 
OptA: orange ball.
OptB: white ball.
OptC: blue ball.
